title: Amazon Reports Earnings Today. Here’s What to Expect.
text:
Amazon.com reports third-quarter earnings after the close of trading on Thursday. Its shares have come under pressure from growing concerns about both the costs of one-day shipping and increasing competition in the public cloud, where Amazon Web Services remains well ahead of rival offerings from Microsoft, Alphabet’s Google, Oracle, and others.

For the quarter, Amazon (ticker: AMZN) is projecting sales of $66 billion to $70 billion, with operating income of $2.1 billion to $3.1 billion. The Street consensus is $68.8 billion...
description: Amazon stock has come under pressure from growing concerns about both the costs of one-day shipping and increasing competition in the cloud.
